verses.verse: In the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> in the sixth <S%H8345><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> in the first <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> the Word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came by <S%H3027><s%> Haggai, <S%H2292><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> to Zerubbabel, <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel, <S%H7597><s%> governor <S%H6346><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehozadak, <S%H3087><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest, <S%H3548><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"This is what <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> says: <S%H559><s%> These people <S%H5971><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H6256><s%> 'The time hasn't <S%H935><s%> yet come, the time <S%H6256><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> to be built. <S%H1129><s%>'"
Then the Word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came by <S%H3027><s%> Haggai, <S%H2292><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Is it a time <S%H6256><s%> for you yourselves to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in your paneled <S%H5603><s%> houses, <S%H1004><s%> while this house <S%H1004><s%> lies waste? <S%H2720><s%>
Now therefore this is what Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> says: <S%H559><s%> Consider <S%H7760><s%> your ways. <S%H1870><s%>

You have sown <S%H2232><s%> much, <S%H7235><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> in little. <S%H4592><s%> You eat, <S%H398><s%> but you don't <S%H7654><s%> have enough. You drink, <S%H8354><s%> but you aren't <S%H7937><s%> filled with drink. You clothe <S%H3847><s%> yourselves, <S%H2527><s%> but no one is warm, and he who earns wages <S%H7936><s%> earns wages <S%H7936><s%> to put them into a bag <S%H6872><s%> with holes in it. <S%H5344><s%>"
This is what Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> says: <S%H559><s%> "Consider <S%H7760><s%> your ways. <S%H1870><s%>

Go up <S%H5927><s%> to the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and build <S%H1129><s%> the house. <S%H1004><s%> I will take pleasure <S%H7521><s%> in it, <S%H3513><s%> and I will be glorified," says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

"You looked <S%H6437><s%> for much, <S%H7235><s%> and, <S%H4592><s%> behold, it came to little; and when you brought <S%H935><s%> it home, <S%H1004><s%> I blew <S%H5301><s%> it away. <S%H5002><s%> Why?" says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> "Because <S%H3282><s%> of my house <S%H1004><s%> that lies waste, <S%H2720><s%> while each of you is busy <S%H7323><s%> with his <S%H376><s%> own house. <S%H1004><s%>
Therefore for your sake the heavens <S%H8064><s%> withhold <S%H3607><s%> the dew, <S%H2919><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> withholds <S%H3607><s%> its fruit. <S%H2981><s%>

I called <S%H7121><s%> for a drought <S%H2721><s%> on the land, <S%H776><s%> on the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> on the grain, <S%H1715><s%> on the new wine, <S%H8492><s%> on the oil, <S%H3323><s%> on that which the ground <S%H127><s%> brings forth, <S%H3318><s%> on men, <S%H120><s%> on livestock, <S%H929><s%> and on all the labor <S%H3018><s%> of the hands. <S%H3709><s%>"

Then Zerubbabel, <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel, <S%H7597><s%> and Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehozadak, <S%H3087><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest, <S%H3548><s%> with all the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> obeyed <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> and the words <S%H1697><s%> of Haggai, <S%H2292><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> as Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> had sent <S%H7971><s%> him; <S%H5971><s%> and the people feared <S%H3372><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Then Haggai, <S%H2292><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s messenger, <S%H4397><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s message <S%H4400><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "I am with you, <S%H5002><s%>" says Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> stirred up <S%H5782><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Zerubbabel, <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel, <S%H7597><s%> governor <S%H6346><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehozadak, <S%H3087><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest, <S%H3548><s%> and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of all the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the people; <S%H5971><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> and <S%H6213><s%> worked <S%H4399><s%> on the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%>

in the twenty <S%H6242><s%> - fourth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month, <S%H8345><s%> in the sixth month, <S%H2320><s%> in the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%> the king. <S%H4428><s%>
